@Mod.EventBusSubscriber(modid = "your_modid")public class ExampleProfessionHooks {    private static final String TARGET_PROFESSION_ID = "berserker"; // ç›®æ ‡èŒä¸š ID    /**     * ç©å®¶æ‹¥æœ‰æŒ‡å®šèŒä¸šæ—¶ï¼Œä¿æŒä¸€ä¸ªå¸¸é©»è¯æ°´æ•ˆæœã€‚     */    @SubscribeEvent    public static void onPlayerTick(TickEvent.PlayerTickEvent event) {        if (event.phase != TickEvent.Phase.END) {            return;        }        Player player = event.player;        if (player.level().isClientSide()) {            return; // åªåœ¨æœåŠ¡ç«¯å¤„ç†é€»è¾‘        }        String professionId = ProfessionAPI.getProfessionId(player); // å‰©ä½™æ—¶é—´å°‘äºè¯¥å€¼åˆ™é‡æ–°æ–½åŠ         var effect = player.getEffect(MobEffects.DAMAGE_BOOST);        if (effect == null || effect.getDuration() < minDuration) {            player.addEffect(new MobEffectInstance(                    MobEffects.DAMAGE_BOOST,                    220,           // æŒç»­æ—¶é—´ï¼ˆtickï¼‰                    0,             // è¯æ°´ç­‰çº§ï¼ˆ0 = Iï¼‰                    true,          // ambient                    false          // æ˜¯å¦æ˜¾ç¤ºç²’å­ï¼Œå¯æŒ‰éœ€è°ƒæ•´            ));        }    }    /**     * æ‹¥æœ‰æŒ‡å®šèŒä¸šçš„ç©å®¶å¯¹å…¶ä»–å®ä½“é€ æˆé¢å¤– 10% ä¼¤å®³ã€‚     */    @SubscribeEvent    public static void onLivingHurt(LivingHurtEvent event) {        if (!(event.getSource().getEntity() instanceof Player player)) {            return;        }        if (player.level().isClientSide()) {            return; // åªåœ¨æœåŠ¡ç«¯ä¿®æ”¹ä¼¤å®³        }        String professionId = ProfessionAPI.getProfessionId(player);        if (!TARGET_PROFESSION_ID.equals(professionId)) {            return; // åªå¯¹æŒ‡å®šèŒä¸šç”Ÿæ•ˆ        }        float base = event.getAmount();        float extra = base * 0.1F; // 10% é¢å¤–ä¼¤å®³        event.setAmount(base + extra);    }}

   //é€šè¿‡getAddressè·å–çš„åœ°å€    private String address = "0x745d4de0cf93b7d1db8dd8892daf05ac745766ce";        //éƒ¨ç½²HelloWorldåˆçº¦    @GetMapping("/deploy")    public void initSDK() throws ContractException {        // å‘ç¾¤ç»„1éƒ¨ç½²HelloWorldåˆçº¦        CryptoKeyPair cryptoKeyPair = client.getCryptoSuite().getCryptoKeyPair();
